BEACH DATES
DATE SCHEDULING

Ah, yes, yes, you're the alchemist.{break}I'm Paolo, and I do all the carpentry work around here.{break}{mood:like}I'm sure you've met some of the others in town already. Is everyone treating you well?{break}{mood:laugh}We don't get newcomers that often!

I cannot believe that of all the people in town...{break}{mood:laugh}...you want to go on a date with ME.{break}{mood:happy}I thought those days were long over for me!{break}All the same... I cannot say that I am not glad.{break}{mood:laugh}You do not think I am too old?
{mood:happy}I would be honoured.{break}{mood:like}I shall meet you at 20:00.
Hola!{random}Cómo te va?{random}Oye!{random}Hi!
I prefer lovers with experience.
{mood:laugh}I admire your persistence, but I cannot.
Buenos días!
Youths are hard work.
{mood:like}Hmm... how about we try somewhere a little different this time?
Bienvenido!
Let's just only do dates in the dark.

{mood:laugh}Ha ha! You know what you want, eh?{break}{mood:like}I admire that.{break}But I must warn you: I don't think I'm that experienced.{break}{mood:laugh}I have learned very little in my many decades!{break}{mood:like}But it's true that I am much more laid back than in my younger years.{break}Now, come, let me walk you home.
GIFTS
Adiós!{random}Hasta luego!{random}Bye.{random}Take care!{random}Bye!

{mood:laugh}Ha! You are not wrong.{break}{mood:like}A lot of younger people, they are not fully formed.{break}In some ways, this is good. You can shape them, like clay.{break}{mood:laugh}I am beyond shaping. I am an antique vase.{break}{mood:happy}But perhaps some people prefer antique vases, eh?{break}{mood:like}Let us walk home before it gets too dark.
{mood:happy}Did you make this yourself?{break}Look at that craftsmanship. It is beautiful!{break}Thank you!
Buenos días!

{mood:laugh}Oh, I am wounded!{break}{mood:dislike}I'm not that wrinkly, am I? I take care of my skin!{break}{mood:default}Well... perhaps this is a sign that this is not meant to be.{break}I think I shall go home, now.
{mood:like}You made this?{break}Thank you. That is very kind.
{mood:like}A gift! Gracias!
Hola, mi amor!

{npc:up}When I was younger, we would take Gaiana here on weekends.{break}{mood:laugh}Lina and I, we were so young! Too young.{break}{mood:like}Gaiana loved the ocean, though.{break}{mood:happy}She liked to drape herself in seaweed and pretend to be a monster.{break}{npc:left}You have talked to Gaiana, yes? What do you think?
Ah... thank you.{break}{mood:dislike}I must be honest... I am not a fan of berries or mushrooms.{break}And this is that. My apologies.
Te amo!
I'd like to get to know her better.
{mood:laugh}Oh, no no no. {break}{mood:like}I absolutely hate applums.{break}{mood:laugh}It is funny that you found the one thing I loathe!
She's... a bit scary.
Hola, mi amor!{random}You look beautiful!{random}Come here and talk to Paolo!
What did you do to make her so mean?
{mood:dislike}Did you forget that we had a date?{break}I am very serious about turning up for events on time.
It's getting late, mi amor!

{mood:laugh}That is a very diplomatic answer.{break}{mood:like}I know she can be intimidating, trust me.{break}She did not handle the divorce very well, I think.{break}But she will come around. She just puts up walls to protect herself.{break}Show her you are not going anywhere, and she will warm up.{break}{mood:laugh}Speaking of warming up, I am getting a little cold.{break}{mood:like}Let us head back inside.
It was an honest mistake.
Adios, mi amor!{random}I love you.{random}Paolo is HUNGRY.

{mood:laugh}Ah, you are honest!{break}{mood:default}Ay, she has been that way for a long time. Since the divorce.{break}She was a very sensitive child. It really shook her.{break}{mood:like}But she's much better off without Lina and I being together, even if she didn't feel it at the time.{break}She will warm up to you. It might take a while.{break}{mood:laugh}Speaking of warming up, I am getting a little cold.{break}{mood:like}Let us head back inside.
I'm really forgetful. Sorry.
Enjoy your day!

{mood:sad}Ah... it was the divorce.{break}She was a very sensitive child. It shook her badly.{break}It was for the best, but children do not know that.{break}{mood:dislike}But she is not mean. She is just... cautious.{break}Please be kind to her. She is everything to me.{break}I need to go home now. Goodnight.
{mood:dislike}I will let you off, but I am hurt all the same.{break}Please do not forget next time.
Go to bed, mi amor!

I was not entirely sure that you would want to come back here.{break}Not the beach, I mean... the date.{break}{mood:laugh}No, no, do not worry! I am not about to get introspective.{break}{mood:like}I bet you get a lot of that, eh? People telling you all their feelings.{break}I would say it is because you are a good listener...{break}{mood:laugh}But I think it is because everyone here knows each other too well.{break}{mood:happy}Well, I am glad you asked me out again, anyway. I am having fun.

{mood:happy}Did you notice that there is a pep in my step today?{break}It is my birthday!{break}{mood:like}Lina says I am too old to get excited about birthdays.{break}{mood:laugh}I say I should get excited because I am running out of birthdays to have!
I know, this has been great!
{mood:laugh}Ah, you have made this birthday even more exceptional.{break}{mood:like}Gracias!
Aw, thanks.
{mood:dislike}Ah... where did you get this from?{break}Is it a tradition where you are from to give people such things on birthdays?
I'm just doing senior citizen service.

{mood:happy}I am so glad you agree!{break}{mood:like}It has been a nice change of pace for me.{break}You know, sometimes it feels like every day is the same on Moonstone.{break}You have made things a little more colourful.{break}Shall we head home? I'm getting cold!

{mood:happy}You are welcome!{break}{mood:like}But seriously, it has been nice to do something different.{break}On Moonstone, sometimes it feels like time is standing still.{break}{mood:laugh}The most interesting thing that normally happens is a new shape of cloud!{break}{mood:like}Shall I walk you home?

{mood:dislike}I am only in my 40s, you know.{break}{mood:default}But, still, I am the oldest inhabitant of Moonstone.{break}Trust me, I have enough worries about standing out. Or running out of time.{break}{mood:awkward}Ah! I am just doing what everyone else does, and dumping feelings on you.{break}{mood:default}I am sorry.{break}I think I shall head home. Ciao.
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a moonstone baracelet

{mood:like}I wanted to come to the beach tonight to show you something.{break}{npc:down}Do you see that glow? Far off in the distance?{break}{mood:sad}I have never left this island.{break}{mood:default}But that glow has always been there, as long as I have lived.{break}I have often wondered what it is.{break}{mood:like}But perhaps... perhaps the joy is in not knowing.{break}Do you know what I mean?
{mood:like}Ah, a Moonstone Bracelet! It has been a long time since someone gave me one of these.{break}{mood:happy}Are you asking me to be your paramour?{break}It would be an honour!
Do you need any new furniture?{break}I just cut down a tree this morning and now I have a lot of wood.
What do you think it is?
Yes!
Are you getting enough sleep?
Nah, I'm too curious.
No, sorry.
Do you like dad jokes?{break}{mood:laugh}I love a good dad joke.
It's just a Moonstone.
{mood:love}I cannot say I understand why you want this, but I accept.{break}{mood:laugh}I must be the least eligible person in town, mi amor!{break}{mood:like}As I said... I am honoured.
{mood:like}My hair just naturally looks this good, you know.

{mood:like}My thoughts change day to day.{break}Sometimes, I am convinced it is a long-lost beacon from an ancient civilisation.{break}{mood:happy}Other times, I think perhaps it is a fallen star.{break}{mood:sad}I often wonder if it is meant for someone else. Someone who will never see it.{break}A message, falling on deaf ears.{break}{mood:like}A sad story, but a beautiful one nonetheless.{break}Perhaps one day you can find out what it is.{break}{mood:laugh}But promise never to tell me!
{mood:dislike}Ah, that is a disappointment, but no matter.{break}{mood:default}I understand.
I hope you are not staying out too late.

{mood:laugh}Oh, I used to be more curious, it is true.{break}{mood:like}But the more I learn, the less I know.{break}I have learned to give in to my ignorance. To see it as a blessing.{break}{mood:happy}There are so many things to discover.{break}{mood:love}The world is a beautiful place.{break}I am glad to share it with you.
I would love to fly around like you do.

{mood:sad}Ah. You are right, probably.{break}{mood:default}After all, you have left this island, and seen many things.{break}You know many of the answers to the mysteries of this world.{break}Sometimes, I regret not going on adventures.{break}{mood:like}Other times, I am glad to have so many questions unanswered.{break}In short... I do not envy you. I like a little mystery.{break}Shall we head back?
// If heart level is too low, NPC will decline the bracelet
Do you think I can make a broom that flies?{break}{mood:happy}I would not trust it to hold my weight, I think!
{mood:sad}I do not think you know what you are asking for.{break}I cannot accept.
TAVERN DATES
{mood:like}This town is small, but it has a nice mix of people.

{mood:default}So, it is... like a coffee cup that is alive?{break}{mood:awkward}With a face?{break}AND A SOUL??{break}That is truly horrifying.{break}{mood:laugh}Okay, I feel as though I have asked you enough questions.{break}{mood:like}What would you like to know about me in return?
// Confirmation dialogue when you give an NPC a grass baracelet
Stay very still. I think... I just saw a lizard.
What is your favourite thing to carve?
A Grass Bracelet?{break}{mood:sad}This can only mean...{break}You are tired of me?
{mood:happy}I love summer days like this!
How did you know you were non-binary?
I'm breaking up with you.
I am in dire need of a coffee.
Why did you and Lina break up?
No! Not at all!
{mood:happy}Working hard or hardly working, eh?{break}{mood:laugh}I am just teasing. You work too hard, amigo.

{mood:laugh}Ah, you show interest in my work!{break}{mood:happy}They say the way to the heart of someone is through food, eh?{break}{mood:laugh}The way to Paolo's heart is through wood!{break}{mood:like}I like making things that are simple and practical, you know?{break}A cup, a table, a spoon for cooking...{break}When you really connect with the material, and its purpose.{break}{mood:laugh}There, now you know I am a person who is a little too obsessed with wood.{break}{mood:happy}Let us have one more drink, and then I should get to bed!

Ah. I thought this might happen.{break}{mood:sad}I will not lie... I thought perhaps you were the one for me, after everything I had been through.{break}Perhaps we too can be friends some day. But first, I will need time.
{mood:happy}It is the weekend, baby!

{mood:like}I think in some way I have always known.{break}I just... feel it. Deep within me.{break}It is just a fundamental truth about me. Like, I am alive. I am here with you.{break}{mood:happy}And I am non-binary!{break}{mood:like}The world is full of people. So many different ones.{break}We are in charge of only ourselves, but we can love other people for who they are.{break}{mood:happy}I hope that makes sense.{break}Now, let us have one more drink before we leave!
{mood:sad}Oh, mi amor, my HEART.{break}{mood:laugh}You almost gave me a heart attack!{break}{mood:like}I am glad that you do not want to end things.
It is so wonderful to see you thriving here.

{mood:awkward}Ay, that might be a bit of a personal question for a date so early.{break}{mood:default}Perhaps I will tell you some day, but not now.{break}{mood:sad}The wounds are still a little fresh.{break}I am sorry. You did not know.{break}{mood:like}Enough about that, though! Shall we have one more drink before we go?
{mood:sad}I have run out of ideas for what to build.

{mood:happy}Hey, look at that! You were almost on time this time.{break}{mood:laugh}Don't worry, I am just pulling your leg.{break}{mood:like}So! Serious decisions to make, now.{break}Ossono has two new beers. One is a 12% stout, made with Mossballs.{break}The other one is a 6.5% ale, made with Lightning Eels.{break}{mood:happy}Let us try them both. Which one do you want?
{mood:happy}Hola! Do you want to watch the fireworks with Paolo?
More hints for how to get Gaiana to like you?{break}{mood:laugh}Patience. And plants.
The ale, please!
Yes, I do!
{mood:sad}You know, I try to be cheerful, but today is not the day for me.
The stout, please!
I'm still deciding!
Guess who has two thumbs and nearly sawed through both of them?{break}{mood:laugh}This guy!
I'll just stick to water.
{mood:happy}Excellent. I was hoping you'd ask me!{break}{mood:like}Come, let us get a good seat.
Do you want to buy a chair?{break}{mood:like}You should buy a chair. I have chairs.

{mood:happy}Excellent choice! I am getting the stout.{break}{mood:like}We can share, if you are willing.{break}I am glad you are feeling adventurous like me!{break}I am almost certain that both these drinks will be awful.{break}{mood:happy}But if you never try, you never know!{break}{mood:like}And for the record, I am glad I took the scary option of saying yes to a date with you.{break}{mood:laugh}Not that you are scary, of course!{break}{mood:like}But the potential of dates going wrong, with a population size like this? That can be scary.{break}{mood:happy}Stay here, and I shall go and order. Paolo, away!
I would sell my left kidney for a cup of coffee right now.

{mood:laugh}A beer drinker after my own heart! I am also getting the stout.{break}{mood:like}Although, honestly, I was hoping you would choose the ale. We could have shared...{break}{mood:happy}But perhaps it is better to have the same experience, together.{break}{mood:like}And thank you for agreeing to be... adventurous with me.{break}I am almost certain that these beers will be terrible.{break}But sticking to the safe path was never my idea of fun.{break}{mood:happy}Stay here, and I shall order the drinks! Paolo, away!
{mood:happy}Nice to SAW you. Heheheh!

{mood:sad}Ah, that is no fun.{break}{mood:default}You are not adventurous, then?{break}I would have thought that an actual adventurer like you would be always looking to try new things.{break}{mood:happy}As for Paolo, I say, fortune favours the bold!{break}{mood:happy}I shall order BOTH drinks for myself. And a glass of water for my companion.{break}Stay here, and I shall be back with the drinks!
// When the player gives a spirit to an NPC (the matchmaker quest)

{mood:happy}Oh, wow!{break}{mood:like}I have never seen a Spirit so close... He is beautiful.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you so much! I love him already!{break}{mood:like}And, as a thank you, please take this crafting recipe. On the house!
{mood:awkward}Don't come too near to me!{break}{mood:laugh}I spent the last hour greasing up a hinge.

{mood:sad}...and since that day, I cannot stand Applums.{break}{mood:laugh}I suppose I should not have eaten them all.{break}{mood:like}Ah, you are so easy to talk to.{break}{mood:laugh}But look at the time! We have been here for three hours.{break}So, enough about me.{break}{mood:like}I have seen you give gifts to people almost every day.{break}But what is your favourite gift to receive?
{mood:like}Ah, is this my Spirit companion?{break}{mood:default}Hmm... it is not quite what I envisioned...{break}{mood:happy}But I do not mind waiting for the perfect one!
{mood:like}I love your hair.{break}Do you think I could do mine like that?
I like handmade things.
{mood:like}I am going to put my slippers on and fall asleep in my armchair later.
I like seeds and plants.
{mood:happy}Ah, you did it! Thank you, Alchemist!{break}I put aside a little money for you to cover your time and effort! Take it, take it!
{mood:dislike}It is too cold!
Money.
I am considering heading to Ferra's forge.{break}It is so warm next to her fire.

{mood:like}Ah, a great choice!{break}{mood:laugh}I would say that, though. I am a carpenter! I make things!{break}{mood:like}But a handmade gift... it is a part of the gift giver's soul.{break}A precious thing that they are sharing with you.{break}There is nothing like it in the world.{break}{mood:laugh}I still have all of Gaiana's childhood artwork, somewhere!{break}{mood:like}You are so wonderful, you know.{break}But I must call it a night, or I will never leave.{break}Allow me to walk you home.
Has Gaiana been sassing you?{break}{mood:laugh}Ah, you can take it!

{mood:laugh}Of course! You are a farmer, among other things.{break}{mood:like}I suppose it is my lot in life to fall for horticulturists.{break}{mood:happy}Not that I am complaining. It is an honorable hobby.{break}{mood:like}To nurture and care for a growing thing... that is beautiful.{break}{mood:laugh}I have never had the skill, myself... other than Gaiana, I suppose!{break}{mood:like}Now, I must call it a night, or I shall never leave.{break}Allow me to walk you home.
{mood:dislike}All this snow is no bueno for Paolo.

...Well, I suppose you are honest, at least.{break}I have always found money to be a little lacking as a gift.{break}It is always appreciated, but gifts are about showing that you know someone.{break}I could spend nothing on something I have made, and that does not mean it is less valuable.{break}{mood:laugh}We shall have to agree to disagree on this!{break}{mood:like}Now, it is late, and I need to return home.{break}Allow me to walk you back to yours, also.
// Confirmation dialogue when you propose to marry and all conditions are met
{mood:like}Oh! Are you asking me to marry you?
Text

I think I have discovered something about you.{break}I have watched you with other people, observed how you go about your day.{break}{mood:laugh}Do not worry, I am not stalking you!{break}{mood:like}It is hard not to see these things on an island so small.{break}I hope you do not mind me saying this, but...{break}{mood:default}...you are very hard-working. Perhaps... TOO hard-working.{break}Do you think you are the kind of person who values hard work above all else?
Yes! Will you marry me?

{mood:happy}Happy first day of spring!{break}{mood:default}My older brother used to punch me on the first of every season.{break}{mood:laugh}Do not worry, I am not one to stick to traditions for the sake of it!
I feel like I'm the only one who can fix things.
Oh, sorry, wrong gift...
{mood:like}Today is Gaiana's birthday.{break}She has always loved Yarrow.{break}But in a pinch, any plant will do as a gift!
I know I work too hard.
{mood:happy}Oh, I am the luckiest Paolo in the world! Yes, of course, yes!{break}{mood:love}Mi amor, I will make you the happiest person in the world. It is a Paolo guarantee.
It is hot today, eh?{break}{mood:like}Must be almost summer already.
Maybe I just work harder than YOU.
{mood:sad}Oh... Never mind.
Have you visited our hot spring yet?{break}{mood:like}It restores your energy. I cannot explain it. It is wonderful.

{mood:sad}Ay, mi amor.{break}{mood:default}Perhaps we have become too complacent here.{break}{mood:like}It takes someone new to shake things up again, and I am glad you have.{break}You have made a world of difference. To Moonstone Island, and to me.{break}{mood:default}But we need YOU. Not the things you can do.{break}Take care of yourself. No one else can do that for you.{break}And if you ever need a break... you can always come to me.{break}{mood:like}Now, let's get you home. You look like you have had a long day!
Don't tell her I told you this, but Gaiana, my daughter...{break}She's very private.{break}{mood:laugh}She doesn't take after me much at all!

Ay, then perhaps it is time for a break?{break}I see you running around on errands, working hard to help the spirits...{break}{mood:like}But, mi amor, the world can wait for a day or two.{break}{mood:laugh}I worry about you almost as much as I worry about Gaiana!{break}{mood:like}But, en serio, if you need a rest, come to my shop.{break}Just sit for a while. Do nothing.{break}{mood:default}And although I am enjoying this date...{break}{mood:laugh}I think we should get you home. You look exhausted!
// If too early to marry, NPC will decline the bracelet
Lina tells me that scythe of yours can be used to harvest seeds.{break}{mood:like}What a useful little tool. Perhaps I shall make myself one.

{mood:angry}How dare you!{break}I was simply trying to say that you deserve a break.{break}{mood:dislike}But you come for my work? That is inexcusable.{break}I take great pride in my work.{break}You need to learn that the world does not revolve around you.{break}{npc:down}I am leaving.{break}Do not ask me out again if you only want to insult me.
{mood:happy}Ah, my dear, I am flattered! But we do not know one another well enough!{break}{mood:laugh}I have one failed marriage under my belt already, I don't need another one!
I remembered a thing that Ofelia told me long ago.{break}{mood:like}The spirits out there love flax. You can use it to tame them!
{mood:like}I was just saying to Lina that you seem to be settling in nicely.
HOTSPRING DATES
{mood:happy}I am so happy for you! You two look great together.{break}If you are needing a Paolo-made crib in the future, you know where to come to!
You know, I am really good at making nice beds, if you need one.{break}{mood:like}You will sleep like a baby on a Paolo bedframe... or your money back.{break}{mood:laugh}Eh, no guarantees.

{mood:like}This is a great date location. I have not been here with another person in years!{break}In fact... I think the last time was when Gaiana was a kid.{break}{mood:laugh}It's nice! Beats being alone with just my thoughts.{break}{mood:happy}Ah, now I am reminiscing... Gaiana would pretend to be a mermaid and try to splash me with her "tail".{break}{mood:laugh}Do not tell her I told you that.{break}{mood:happy}Thank you for the good memories! They make me feel like a kid again!
Whatever you do, do NOT give Gaiana fish.{break}{mood:laugh}Do not ask me how I know!
I would have brought you here sooner if I'd known!
Shall we depart, my darling?
I cut down a tree yesterday, hoping for some new wood...{break}{mood:dislike}But it was all rotted away inside.{break}It must be all this heavy rain we have had lately.
*splash Paolo*
Sure, let's get outta here!
Our hot spring is totally free, you know!{break}{mood:laugh}Ossono tried to run it for a while, but it turns out that it basically runs itself.
Aren't you a bit old for that?
Let's stay a bit longer, ok?
You know, we could add a little extra to your house.{break}{mood:like}A balcony, a sauna...{break}{mood:laugh}No, you are right. Something more sensible.

{mood:laugh}Let us ask Zed to build us a time machine.{break}{mood:happy}We can just pause time, and come here, and relax.{break}{mood:like}Oh, man, if I had a time machine... Can you imagine?{break}I think I would want to stay in this moment for days.{break}{mood:sad}Alas, time is always moving on. And it is getting late.{break}{mood:happy}I shall walk you home, like the brave Paolo I am!

{mood:awkward}That little thing you use to fly around... it looks so unsafe.{break}{mood:default}Are you sure you don't want me to fix it?{break}{mood:like}I could add a seat... maybe some airbags...{break}{mood:laugh}No? Okay, fine!

{mood:awkward}Ah! Perfidy!{break}{mood:laugh}You have ruined my carefully-coiffed hair.{break}{mood:sad}But no! I cannot splash you in revenge!{break}{mood:default}I am too noble.{break}{mood:happy}Buuuuut... now I have to go home and take a shower.{break}{mood:laugh}I was not entirely joking about my hair!

Felicitaciones, Alchemist! You have saved us all.{break}{mood:laugh}I am glad that I did not realise how close we were to complete annihilation, though. Paolo does not deal well with existential horrors.
I like to take a nice, long walk on Sundays.{break}{mood:happy}You can join me if you wish!

{mood:dislike}You are only as old as you feel.{break}{mood:awkward}Is the age difference between us an issue?{break}{mood:default}I had hoped that it was not.{break}I mean... it had not seemed to matter before.{break}{mood:sad}Unless you have just been waiting to say something.{break}...I am sorry if I have misread the signals.{break}I shall go.
{mood:like}Is it not beautiful up here?
{mood:like}Aha, I see you have made a beautiful Paolo's Pie!{break}{mood:happy}And it is for Paolo? Lucky Paolo! Thank you!
{mood:like}It is such a lovely morning.

I have heard that there are hot springs like this one on other islands.{break}{mood:happy}Such a luxury! A hot spring all to yourself.{break}{mood:sad}It is hard to get time to oneself on an island so small.{break}{mood:default}Sometimes I go up to the mountain, or to the beach, but always there is someone there.{break}{mood:like}But it is strange... with you, I feel as if I am with a part of myself.{break}As if I am alone, but... not alone. In a good way.{break}{mood:awkward}Am I making sense?
You can be yourself with me?

{mood:happy}Paolo loves to see new things happening on this beautiful island!{break}{mood:like}Do you think the Great Spirit enjoys handmade chairs?{break}Oh, and... maybe you would like to spend the festival with Paolo?
{mood:happy}Ah, finally, the summer sun is back!
I'm easy to hang out with?
{mood:happy}Hooray for Paolo!
Everything is 50% off today.{break}{mood:laugh}As long as you pay the other 50% too!
I'm like a ghost?
{mood:dislike}Gaiana's in one of her moods.{break}Ay, it's so hard to have a daughter sometimes.{break}{mood:like}Maybe she would cheer up if you said hi?

{mood:happy}Yes! That is precisely it!{break}{mood:like}I feel as though I can be myself around you.{break}You make it so easy to feel relaxed, to feel at home.{break}It has been such a long time since I have felt that with anyone.{break}{mood:laugh}I think that is a good sign for our relationship!{break}{mood:awkward}Oh no. Did you just feel a raindrop?{break}{mood:laugh}Come, let me walk you home before it starts to pour!
{mood:happy}Oh, meteors are very cool, but... Paolo's just here for the company!{break}{mood:like}I love when everyone gets together like this.{break}Would you like to watch the skies with me?
If you need your house upgraded, let me know.

Ah, yes, but that is not quite it.{break}{mood:like}You are easy to hang out with, as you say.{break}But it is more than that. You are... like...{break}{mood:sad}I do not know. I am not good with words.{break}{mood:love}Perhaps I can show you how I feel... in some other way?{break}{mood:laugh}Ah, I am not good with flirting either!{break}{mood:like}Come, let me walk you home. I believe it is starting to rain!
{mood:happy}Happy times for Paolo!
I am not going to tell you how to make my daughter like you.{break}{mood:laugh}Gaiana is her own person.

{mood:laugh}Ha, no! I do not mean like that.{break}{mood:default}But I am sorry that I cannot make my meaning clear.{break}I would love to tell you how I feel, how you make me feel.{break}{mood:sad}Ah, well. There is always next time.{break}{mood:default}We should get out, I think. I believe it is starting to rain...
I have heard that staying up past 2am is very bad for your health.{break}{mood:dislike}Make sure to get a good night's sleep. Your body will thank you!
{mood:like}Paolo is good at many things, but cooking? Not one of them.{break}{mood:happy}I have submitted a sandwich.
I hope you are wearing sunscreen, camarada.

I am exhausted after that hike.{break}{mood:like}But the hot spring is the perfect place to end.{break}I feel as though all the pain is melting away...{break}{mood:laugh}And let me tell you, at my age, the pains are many!{break}{mood:happy}What was your favourite part of the hike?
Gaiana's bite is worse than her bark.{break}{mood:awkward}Wait, no. Her bark is worse than her bite?{break}{mood:laugh}Yes, that is it.
Holding hands the whole time.
Oh, I meant to ask - you are coming to the tavern tomorrow?{break}{mood:happy}I hear Ossono has got a new batch of beer!
Almost falling off the edge.
{mood:happy}Grab yourself a beer and join the party!
I don't really like hiking. Sorry.
Remember that Mossball stout that Ossono made a while ago?{break}{mood:happy}It is back, and I am drinking it again!{break}{mood:like}It really grows on you. Perhaps literally.

{mood:love}Ah, that was my favourite part, too.{break}{mood:laugh}Even though it made some of the climbing very difficult.{break}{mood:love}To find someone whose company is more enjoyable than a beautiful sunset...{break}That is truly rare.{break}Thank you, my love.{break}{mood:like}Now, I think I am just about done relaxing.{break}Do you think your legs can carry you home after all that walking?{break}{mood:laugh}Or am I going to have to carry you myself?
Have you talked to Lina today?{break}I mean, Ofelia. I call her Lina.{break}{mood:laugh}Long story.

{mood:laugh}Ah, you are such a thrillseeker!{break}{mood:like}In that case, my favourite part was when you did NOT fall off the edge.{break}{mood:happy}If you died, I would be very angry at you.{break}{mood:like}I think I am almost done relaxing.{break}Do you think your legs can carry you home after all that walking?{break}{mood:laugh}Or am I going to have to carry you myself?

You need help with finding out what to give Lina, I mean, Ofelia, for her birthday?{break}{mood:like}Ah, Ofelia loves many things.{break}Coffee to wake her up, fertilizer to feed her plants...{break}{mood:happy}Plus, seeds, of course. She is always looking for new seeds!

{mood:sad}Oh. That is a shame.{break}{mood:default}Why did you not say anything sooner?{break}Perhaps you did not know.{break}Next time, we shall do something different, then.{break}{mood:sad}I am disappointed, though. I have been looking forward to this date.{break}{mood:default}Ah well. Shall we dry off?

It is Lina's birthday in early fall.{break}I am looking for a present to give to her.{break}{mood:laugh}Ten years ago, I would not have even wanted to LOOK at her!{break}Now we give each other presents!
{mood:like}You have caught me enjoying a moment of solitude.{break}{mood:laugh}It is one of those days where I prefer my own company!
I promised you a long time ago that I would tell you about Lina and I.{break}Well, I think it is time.{break}Are you sure you want to know all the details?
{mood:happy}You are looking very nice today, mi amor!
As long as you're ready to tell me.
Yes!
Text
I'm hoping for some juicy gossip.
{mood:sad}I saw the first leaf fall this morning.{break}It may surprise you, but Paolo... is not an autumn fan.

{mood:like}I appreciate that.{break}{mood:default}Well, here goes.{break}When Gaiana was younger, I think, Lina and I were having difficulties.{break}She wanted to try new things, go to new places... but I wanted to settle down.{break}{mood:sad}We just could not agree.{break}She felt tied down.{break}I felt that she wanted to throw away all that we had worked so hard to build.{break}{mood:default}Ah, it is not that simple, of course.{break}We were both right, we were both wrong.{break}{mood:sad}She moved out, very suddenly.{break}And for years, I felt... I felt like I was not enough. My very best self was not enough.{break}...{break}...{break}{mood:default}It was hard. But it got better eventually. It had to.{break}{mood:like}In a town this small, you have to learn to sit down and work things out.{break}{mood:laugh}Well, there is my life story. And now, let us get you home!
{mood:like}Today is Ofelia's birthday.{break}You should bring her Ossono's dish of the day. It is an easy gift for her!

Well, that is good. It is a bit of a long one.{break}When Gaiana was younger, I think, Lina and I were having difficulties.{break}She wanted to try new things, go to new places... but I wanted to settle down.{break}{mood:sad}We just could not agree.{break}She felt tied down. I felt that she wanted to throw away all that we had worked so hard to build.{break}{mood:default}Ah, it is not that simple, of course.{break}We were both right, we were both wrong.{break}{mood:sad}She moved out, very suddenly.{break}And for years, I felt... I felt like I was not enough. My very best self was not enough.{break}...{break}...{break}{mood:default}It was hard. But it got better eventually. It had to.{break}{mood:like}In a town this small, you have to learn to sit down and work things out.{break}{mood:laugh}Well, there is my life story. And now, let us get you home!
Can I help you find anything, mi amor?

{mood:dislike}No, no no no. My life is not gossip.{break}I know it is a joke, but promise me you will not talk about this with people.{break}{mood:default}Yes? Okay. Here is the story, then.{break}Lina and I disagreed on a few things.{break}But the worst argument we kept having was about where we wanted to live.{break}Lina wanted to travel, I wanted to stay here and settle down.{break}{mood:sad}One day she moved out without telling me.{break}And for a few years, it was ugly between us.{break}{mood:default}And then... we worked it out. We had to. The town is too small for all that.{break}That is it. I have skipped over some of the details...{break}{mood:dislike}...I suppose I am a little wary that you will treat this as gossip.{break}{mood:sad}Please. For Gaiana's sake, at least. Keep this to yourself.{break}{mood:default}I think I will go home now.{break}I can walk you home, if you want to get out too.
{mood:like}You've gotten a lot stronger since you have been here. I can tell.
Gaiana is, ah, what's the word Lina used?{break}{mood:laugh}A big grumpy boots.{break}{mood:like}But she has a good heart.
HOME DATES
Here is some advice for you.{break}Do not be afraid to make mistakes.{break}{mood:like}Life is a tapestry of mistakes. Learn how to weave them in.

{mood:laugh}It has been a while since I have entertained a guest at casa mia.{break}{mood:happy}Usually it is just me, myself, and Paolo.{break}{mood:like}Gaiana prefers her place, and I do not mind visiting her.{break}{mood:happy}But tonight, it felt right to bring you here after our dinner.{break}{mood:like}How did you find the meal?
I hope one day Gaiana finds someone who loves her for who she is.{break}{mood:sad}She has had some baaaad romantic interests in the past.
I enjoyed the company.
I have a joke for you.{break}{mood:like}What clothes do clouds wear?{break}{mood:laugh}Thunder-wear! Haha!
The food was incredible.
Lina told me to tell you about this glowing grass she saw last night.{break}{mood:laugh}I told her she sounded like someone who's spent too much time with plants.
I think I'm allergic to whatever that was.

{mood:like}Did you know, in the old world, they had something called "video games"?{break}Zed was telling me about it today!{break}They were like... little... things. That you looked at.{break}{mood:laugh}Zed was not very good at explaining it.

{mood:love}As did I. As did I.{break}{mood:like}But that food was incredible!{break}I had no idea Ossono could cook so well.{break}{mood:laugh}Normally, the tavern serves things like Stonefruit Fries and Pickled Fire Flower.{break}{mood:happy}Everything battered and fried. Not that I am complaining.{break}{mood:like}But the things she had foraged were delicious.{break}{mood:happy}Perhaps we should hire her out for dates more often!{break}{mood:laugh}If I can afford it, that is!{break}{mood:love}The night is still young... Perhaps you would like to stay for a drink?
Have you heard me play the guitar?{break}{mood:laugh}I am very... not good.{break}{mood:happy}That is why I practice!

{mood:happy}Who knew Ossono could cook like that?!{break}{mood:like}The sautéed Cat Tails were incredible... and that Stonefruit dip?{break}{mood:laugh}I will be thinking about this night for a long time.{break}{mood:like}But the night is still young...{break}{mood:love}Perhaps you would like to stay for a drink?
{mood:like}Raise a glass with me, mi amor!
{mood:awkward}En serio?!{break}You have to say something sooner if you are hurt!{break}{mood:dislike}Ay, come, let us get you to Lina.{break}I cannot believe you just kept quiet...
The trick to guitar is letting the music flow through you.{break}{mood:laugh}I am kidding. The trick to guitar is practicing every day!
So, you can tell me, I will keep it a secret...{break}{mood:like}Who is your favourite person in town?{break}{mood:laugh}No need to answer. It has got to be me, of course!

{mood:like}Thank you for painting my nails, mi amor.{break}{mood:happy}I cannot believe you made this colour yourself. It is beautiful.{break}{mood:like}{npc:right}In fact, I have a gift for you too.{break}{npc:left}I am a skilled carpenter and carver, but whittling is... new to me.{break}{mood:love}I wanted to make you something... fresh. Something new.{break}I want to give you a part of me that no one else has had.{break}{mood:happy}Do you see? It is the two of us, at the tavern!
{mood:like}I love how far you can see up here.{break}On a clear day, you can see so many islands.
The sentiment is as beautiful as the gift.
{mood:like}A beautiful day to be out, is it not?
Paolo, it's lovely!
It looks like two ducks pooping.
Winter has finally come...{break}{mood:like}But soon, spring will be back once more.{break}The seasons, just like life, are one great wheel.

{mood:love}Thank you for saying that, mi amor.{break}Perhaps I have already told you, but...{break}{mood:happy}This is the reason I love crafted gifts so much.{break}{mood:like}Often, the thought process is part of the creation.{break}{mood:laugh}I admit, I know it looks a little... rough.{break}{mood:love}But like our relationship... I would like to improve on my whittling skills every day.{break}There is nothing more beautiful and inspiring than a work-in-progress.{break}Do you want to stay the night, mi amor?
I cannot wait for the spring.{break}{mood:like}Sometimes, I like to stand in the rain as if it were a shower.{break}{mood:happy}It feels like a reset. You should try it!

{mood:happy}Ah, I am relieved.{break}{mood:laugh}You should have seen the ones I threw away.{break}{mood:happy}In my defense, your hair is hard to get right!{break}{mood:like}Anyway... this is just the first gift of many, mi amor.{break}{mood:love}I can make you so many beautiful things.{break}In fact... perhaps you would like to stay the night in my, ah, handmade bed?
Did I see you looking at a treasure map the other day?{break}{mood:laugh}If you become rich from treasure, you HAVE to tell us!

{mood:awkward}Oh... it does. You are right.{break}{mood:sad}{npc:down}Ay, like I said, whittling is new to me.{break}I am sorry. I shall take it back.{break}Perhaps I can try again. In fact...{break}{mood:default}I think I shall try again tonight.{break}{npc:left}I shall walk you home on the way to my workshop.
You know, if we were able to choose...{break}I think the next person I would want to come to the island is a hypnotist.{break}{mood:laugh}I have always wanted to be hypnotised!
{mood:like}There is nothing like a warm house in cold weather.

Can I show you something... embarrassing?{break}{npc:up}Under here is... my collection of fantasy fiction.{break}{mood:happy}That in itself is not embarrassing.{break}{mood:default}What is embarrassing... is my particular field of interest.{break}Some people enjoy swords, magic, dragons... I enjoy, ah...{break}{mood:happy}...Trains.{break}{mood:like}They are so fascinating! And we have hardly any records of how they worked!{break}They appear to have been fuelled by coal, or by electricity...{break}But how?!{break}{mood:laugh}{npc:left}Ay, my apologies... I am becoming like Zed.{break}{mood:like}It is just that I never get to talk about trains with anyone...
Zed was telling me that Moonstone Island needs trains.{break}{mood:laugh}To go where, I said!
Don't apologise! I love trains!!
{mood:like}You must try the spiced ale!{break}{mood:happy}It will warm you up from the inside out.
It's alright, I like listening to you.
{mood:love}Mi amor, you are so beautiful in the snow.
I wonder why.
{mood:like}Ah! I have an idea for something to build!{break}{mood:happy}Another chair!!

{mood:happy}Truly? You are not just saying that to please me?{break}{mood:love}Ay, you are wonderful.{break}{mood:like}I would have liked to take a train with you.{break}{mood:happy}Some say there were trains that went across mountains and even oceans!{break}Trains that ran overnight... some for days!{break}{mood:love}We could have watched the landscape roll past us...{break}{mood:sad}But I suppose it is not to be.{break}{mood:love}Still... I cannot help but love the life we have.{break}Trains, or no.{break}{mood:happy}But perhaps you will take the overnight train tonight? It's the Paolo Express!

{mood:laugh}Ah, your indulgence is a treat.{break}{mood:like}Thank you, mi amor.{break}You are easy to talk to, and a joy to know.{break}{mood:default}I am sad that we can never take a train together...{break}{mood:happy}...But this life we have, it is not bad.{break}{mood:like}Perhaps I shall invite you on the Paolo Express overnight train, instead.{break}{mood:happy}The view is not the prettiest, but the beds are comfy!
Text

{mood:sad}Ay... you are right...{break}It is a boring subject, I know.{break}Sometimes Zed will indulge me, but even he has his limits.{break}I wish I had someone to talk to about my passions.{break}{mood:default}But we cannot have everything. And at least we have each other.{break}{mood:like}And now you know my dark secret.{break}And with that... I shall call it a night.{break}Buenas noches, mi amor!
{mood:love}You are looking like a bouquet of roses today, mi amor.
It is very cold today.{break}{mood:like}My doctor prescribed me a strict regime of snuggles to keep me warm.{break}{mood:happy}Perhaps you can help me... take my medicine later?

This week, I have been... reflecting on our relationship so far.{break}And, well... Lina and I were special, but...{break}{mood:love}Mi amor... what we have is... something else.{break}{mood:default}I am not saying that my past is unimportant. I will always love Lina in some way.{break}But when we broke up, I thought I would never find love like that again.{break}{mood:like}It turns out that love is not a one-time thing, though.{break}{mood:love}It is something that changes each time.{break}Like a sunset. Never the same colour twice.{break}Thank you... for teaching me to love again.

{mood:dislike}Are you getting enough sleep? You look so tired, mi amor.{break}{mood:like}Beautiful, but tired.{break}{mood:happy}How about tonight I hold you and stroke your hair until you fall asleep?
Eres mi amanecer y atardecer.
{mood:love}Thank you, mi amor, for showing me how to love again.
You did all the hard work, Paolo.
{mood:like}Do you think we need more plants in here? I think we should get more plants.
Sunsets are pretty much always orange and pink.
{mood:happy}I washed the sheets and made the bed earlier!{break}{mood:love}I just really like climbing into fresh, cold sheets. With you.

{mood:love}And you are my dawn and dusk too, mi amor.{break}The reason I get up, and the last thing I think about each day.{break}I am so lucky to have found such a love in my life.{break}{mood:like}And I hope that Gaiana can learn the same thing...{break}That loving after losing is hard.{break}You are placing your mended heart into someone's hands and hoping they do not break it.{break}But it is worth it all the same.{break}{mood:love}Te amo, mi amor.
I keep trying to carve us the perfect piece of furniture...{break}{mood:like}But I really like how you've decorated our place. I can't think of anything that's missing!

{mood:laugh}It is not hard at all!{break}{mood:like}You are too easy to love.{break}But thank you. You are right, it takes strength to love again.{break}I hope I can teach Gaiana what I have learned.{break}That it is so much better to bear your heart and trust someone to treat it gently...{break}...rather than to never have love in your life again.{break}Te amo, mi amor.
The last time I saw Waldo, he did not have so many cards over his face. I like it, though!{break}{mood:happy}Perhaps Paolo should cultivate a sense of mystery, too...

{mood:sad}I... do not think you understand me.{break}{mood:default}They are subtly different, mi amor.{break}Like wood, then. No two logs are the same.{break}I could make the same chair a hundred times, and the grain would make them all unique.{break}I have learned that love is like that.{break}{mood:like}And it is beautiful for it. It is always new. Always surprising.{break}{mood:happy}Can I walk you home one more time, mi amor?
{mood:happy}I am so happy for you and Waldo, Alchemist.{break}{mood:like}The way you two found one another in this crazy world... it makes me believe in love again.

Ah oui, tu es l'alchimiste.{break}Je m'appelle Paolo et je m'occupe de tous les travaux de menuiserie sur l'île.{break}{mood:like}Je suppose que tu as déjà rencontré une bonne partie des habitants. Ça va, tout le monde te traite bien ?{break}{mood:laugh}On n'a pas l'habitude d'accueillir de nouvelles personnes ici !

Je n'arrive pas à croire que de tous les gens de cette île...{break}{mood:laugh}... c'est avec moi que tu veux sortir.{break}{mood:happy}Je pensais que c'était fini pour moi, ces choses-là !{break}En même temps, je ne peux pas dire que ça ne me fait pas plaisir.{break}{mood:laugh}Tu crois que c'est encore de mon âge, tout ça ?
{mood:happy}Ce serait un honneur.{break}{mood:like}On se retrouve à 20 heures.
Hola !{random}Cómo te va ?{random}Oye !{random}Salut !
Je préfère les gens qui ont de l'expérience.
{mood:laugh}J'admire ta persévérance, mais je ne peux pas.
Buenos días !
Avec les jeunes, c'est plus compliqué.
{mood:like}Hmm... Et si on changeait de lieu de rendez-vous, cette fois-ci ?
Bienvenido !
On va se contenter de se donner rendez-vous dans le noir.

{mood:laugh}Haha ! Tu sais ce que tu veux, hein ?{break}{mood:like}Ça me plaît.{break}Mais il faut que tu saches que je n'ai pas tant d'expérience que ça.{break}{mood:laugh}Malgré mon âge, je n'ai pas appris grand-chose !{break}{mood:like}Mais c'est vrai que je suis plus relax que quand j'étais jeune.{break}Allez, viens, je vais te raccompagner chez toi.
Adiós !{random}Hasta luego !{random}Au revoir.{random}Prends soin de toi !{random}Bye !

{mood:laugh}Ha ! Tu n'as pas tort.{break}{mood:like}Les jeunes vont continuer à évoluer.{break}D'une certaine manière, c'est une bonne chose. On peut les façonner, un peu comme de l'argile.{break}{mood:laugh}Moi, j'ai passé ce stade. Je suis un vase antique.{break}{mood:happy}Mais peut-être que certaines personnes préfèrent les vases antiques.{break}{mood:like}Allez, rentrons chez nous avant qu'il fasse noir.
{mood:happy}Tu as fait ça toi-même ?{break}Quelle qualité... C'est magnifique !{break}Merci !
Buenos días !

{mood:laugh}Oh, le coup bas !{break}{mood:dislike}Attends, je n'ai pas tant de rides que ça, si ? Je prends soin de ma peau, pourtant.{break}{mood:default}Bon... C'est peut-être signe que ça ne va pas marcher entre nous.{break}Je crois que je ferais mieux de rentrer chez moi.
{mood:like}C'est toi qui l'as fait ?{break}Merci. C'est très gentil.
{mood:like}Oh, un cadeau ! Gracias !
Hola, mi amor !

{npc:up}Quand Gaïana était petite, on l'emmenait ici, les week-ends.{break}{mood:laugh}On était tellement jeunes, Lina et moi ! Trop jeunes, même.{break}{mood:like}Mais Gaïana adorait l'océan.{break}{mood:happy}Elle s'enroulait dans les algues et elle faisait semblant d'être un monstre.{break}{npc:left}Tu lui as déjà parlé ? Que penses-tu d'elle ?
Euh... merci.{break}{mood:dislike}Pour être honnête avec toi, je n'aime pas trop les baies et les champignons.{break}Et malheureusement, c'est ce que tu m'as offert.
Te amo !
J'aimerais apprendre à mieux la connaître.

{mood:laugh}Oh non. Non, non et non.{break}{mood:like}J'ai une sainte horreur des mirapommes.{break}{mood:laugh}Quand on y pense, c'est quand même assez marrant que tu aies trouvé la chose que je déteste le plus au monde !
Elle fait un peu flipper.
Hola, mi amor !{random}Tu es magnifique !{random}Viens donc discuter avec Paolo !
Qu'est-ce que tu lui as fait pour qu'elle soit aussi méchante ?
{mood:dislike}Tu as oublié qu'on avait rendez-vous ?{break}Tu sais, je ne plaisante pas avec la ponctualité.
Il se fait tard, mi amor !

{mood:laugh}C'est très diplomate, comme réponse.{break}{mood:like}Crois-moi, je sais qu'elle peut être intimidante.{break}Je pense qu'elle a mal pris le divorce.{break}Mais elle finira par baisser la garde. Elle fait ça pour se protéger.{break}Montre-lui que tu es une personne fiable et elle s'ouvrira à toi.{break}{mood:laugh}Bon, ce n'est pas tout ça, mais je commence à avoir froid.{break}{mood:like}On devrait rentrer se mettre au chaud.
C'était indépendant de ma volonté.
Adios, mi amor !{random}Je t'aime.{random}Je meurs de faim.

{mood:laugh}Ah, j'aime ton honnêteté !{break}{mood:default}C'est vrai, elle est comme ça depuis le divorce.{break}C'était une enfant très sensible, ça l'a vraiment perturbée.{break}{mood:like}Mais il valait mieux pour elle qu'on se sépare, Lina et moi, même si elle ne le comprenait pas à l'époque.{break}Elle finira par s'ouvrir à toi, fais preuve de patience.{break}{mood:laugh}Bon, ce n'est pas tout ça, mais je commence à avoir froid.{break}{mood:like}On devrait rentrer se mettre au chaud.
Je suis tête en l'air. Excuse-moi.
Passe une bonne journée !

{mood:sad}Ah... C'est à cause du divorce.{break}C'était une enfant très sensible, ça l'a vraiment perturbée.{break}C'était mieux comme ça, mais les enfants sont trop petits pour le comprendre.{break}{mood:dislike}Mais elle n'est pas méchante. Je dirais plutôt qu'elle est prudente.{break}Ne lui fais pas de mal, je tiens énormément à elle.{break}Bon, je dois y aller. Bonne nuit.
{mood:dislike}Ça ira pour cette fois, même si ça me fait de la peine.{break}La prochaine fois, ne m'oublie pas.
Viens te coucher, mi amor !

Je ne savais pas trop si tu avais envie de revenir.{break}Je ne parle pas de revenir à la plage, hein... Je parle d'un autre rendez-vous.{break}{mood:laugh}Non, non, ne t'inquiète pas ! Je ne vais pas te raconter ma vie.{break}{mood:like}Je parie que tu as déjà ta dose avec les autres habitants, pas vrai ?{break}Ça, c'est parce que tu sais être à l'écoute.{break}{mood:laugh}Mais aussi parce que tout le monde se connaît trop bien, ici.{break}{mood:happy}En tout cas, ça me fait plaisir que tu m'aies proposé un autre rendez-vous. Je passe du bon temps avec toi.

{mood:happy}Tu as remarqué que je suis d'excellente humeur, aujourd'hui ?{break}C'est mon anniversaire !{break}{mood:like}Lina dit que ce n'est plus de mon âge de me réjouir pour ça.{break}{mood:laugh}Moi, je pense que je ferais mieux d'en profiter, parce que je vais avoir de moins en moins d'anniversaires à fêter !
Je sais, moi aussi !
{mood:laugh}Grâce à toi, cet anniversaire est encore plus exceptionnel.{break}{mood:like}Gracias !
Oh, merci.
{mood:dislike}Euh... où est-ce que tu as trouvé ça ?{break}C'est une tradition chez toi d'offrir ce genre de choses pour un anniversaire ?
J'aime bien tenir compagnie aux personnes âgées.

{mood:happy}Ça, c'est une excellente nouvelle !{break}{mood:like}Ça me fait du bien de sortir de ma routine.{break}Parfois, j'ai l'impression que les jours se suivent et se ressemblent sur l'île de la Pierre de lune.{break}Mais toi, tu mets de la couleur dans ma vie.{break}Ça ne te dérange pas si on rentre ? Je commence à avoir froid.

{mood:happy}Mais de rien !{break}{mood:like}Franchement, c'est agréable de faire des choses qui sortent de l'ordinaire.{break}Il faut dire qu'il ne se passe pas grand-chose sur l'île de la Pierre de lune.{break}{mood:laugh}Parfois, l'événement le plus intéressant de la journée, c'est quand on voit un nuage à la forme étrange !{break}{mood:like}Veux-tu que je te raccompagne chez toi ?

{mood:dislike}Tu sais, j'ai seulement la quarantaine.{break}{mood:default}Enfin, il est vrai que je fais partie des personnes les plus âgées sur l'île.{break}Crois-moi, je me fais déjà assez de souci par rapport au temps qui passe.{break}{mood:awkward}Ah, zut... Voilà que je me mets à t'embêter avec mes problèmes, comme tout le monde.{break}{mood:default}Excuse-moi.{break}Je ferais mieux de rentrer chez moi. Tchao.

{mood:like}Je voulais venir à la plage ce soir pour te montrer quelque chose.{break}{npc:down}Vois-tu cette lueur, au loin ?{break}{mood:sad}Je n'ai jamais quitté cette île.{break}{mood:default}Mais cette lueur a toujours été là, aussi loin que je m'en souvienne.{break}Je me suis souvent demandé ce que c'est.{break}{mood:like}Mais... peut-être qu'il vaut mieux garder le mystère.{break}Tu vois ce que je veux dire ?

{mood:like}Oh, un bracelet en pierre de lune ! Il y a bien longtemps qu'on ne m'en avait pas offert un.{break}{mood:happy}Ça veut dire que tu veux qu'on se mette ensemble ?{break}Ce serait un honneur !
Tu as besoin de nouveaux meubles ?{break}J'ai abattu un arbre ce matin, ce qui fait que j'ai plein de bois en stock.
Tu as une idée de ce que c'est ?
Oui !
Tu as bien dormi ?
Non, je suis une personne trop curieuse pour ça.
Non, pardon.
Tu aimes les blagues vaseuses ?{break}{mood:laugh}Moi, j'adore ça.
C'est juste une pierre de lune.

{mood:love}Je ne sais pas pourquoi tu en as envie, mais j'accepte.{break}{mood:laugh}Il y a pourtant de bien meilleurs prétendants que moi sur cette île, mi amor !{break}{mood:like}Mais comme je l'ai dit, c'est un honneur.
{mood:like}C'est ma chevelure naturelle. Elle est belle, hein ?

{mood:like}J'ai une hypothèse différente chaque jour.{break}Parfois, j'ai la certitude que c'est une balise d'une civilisation ancestrale.{break}{mood:happy}D'autres fois, je me dis que c'est peut-être une étoile tombée du ciel.{break}{mood:sad}Je me demande souvent si cette chose est destinée à quelqu'un d'autre qui ne la verra jamais.{break}Un message qui n'atteindra jamais son destinataire.{break}{mood:like}C'est une histoire à la fois belle et triste.{break}Peut-être qu'un jour, tu découvriras ce que c'est.{break}{mood:laugh}Mais promets-moi de ne jamais me le dire !
{mood:dislike}Oh, c'est décevant, mais ça ne fait rien.{break}{mood:default}Je comprends.
J'espère que tu ne te couches pas trop tard.

{mood:laugh}Avant, j'étais d'un naturel plus curieux.{break}{mood:like}Mais plus j'apprends, moins je comprends.{break}J'ai appris à me faire à mon ignorance. Je vois ça comme une sorte de bénédiction.{break}{mood:happy}Il y a tant de choses à découvrir.{break}{mood:love}Le monde est un endroit merveilleux.{break}J'ai beaucoup de chance de le partager avec toi.
J'aimerais bien voler jusqu'aux autres îles comme tu le fais.

{mood:sad}Ah. Tu as sans doute raison.{break}{mood:default}Après tout, tu as quitté cette île et tu as vu plein de choses.{break}Les mystères de ce monde n'ont pas de secret pour toi.{break}Parfois, je regrette de ne jamais avoir essayé de partir à l'aventure.{break}{mood:like}Et le reste du temps, je préfère que mes questions restent sans réponse.{break}Pour faire simple... je ne t'envie pas. J'aime les mystères.{break}Bon, et si on rentrait ?
Tu penses que je suis capable de fabriquer un balai volant ?{break}{mood:happy}J'aurais beaucoup trop peur qu'il cède sous mon poids !
{mood:sad}Je ne pense pas que tu aies vraiment conscience de ce que tu fais.{break}Je ne peux pas accepter.
{mood:like}Cette île a beau être petite, on y trouve des gens de tous les horizons.

{mood:default}Donc, c'est... une sorte de tasse à café vivante ?{break}{mood:awkward}Avec un visage ?{break}Et une âme ??{break}C'est terrifiant.{break}{mood:laugh}Bon, je crois que je t'ai posé assez de questions comme ça.{break}{mood:like}Et toi, qu'est-ce que tu aimerais savoir sur moi ?
Ne bouge pas d'un cil. Je crois que... j'ai vu un lézard.
Qu'est-ce que tu préfères fabriquer ?
Un bracelet végétal ?{break}{mood:sad}Ça ne peut vouloir dire qu'une chose...{break}Tu en as marre de moi, c'est ça ?
{mood:happy}J'aime les journées d'été comme celle-ci !
Comment as-tu su que tu étais non binaire ?
Je veux rompre avec toi.
Un café me ferait le plus grand bien.
Pourquoi vous avez divorcé, Lina et toi ?
Non ! Pas du tout !
{mood:happy}Alors, tu bosses dur ou tu te la coules douce ?{break}{mood:laugh}Je te taquine, je sais que tu bosses dur.

{mood:laugh}Ah, tu t'intéresses à mon travail !{break}{mood:happy}Il paraît que pour séduire une personne, il faut lui préparer de bons petits plats.{break}{mood:laugh}Eh bien, pour me séduire, il faut me parler du bois !{break}{mood:like}J'aime fabriquer des choses à la fois simples et pratiques.{break}Une tasse, une table, une cuillère...{break}C'est quand je crée ce genre d'objets que je me sens vraiment proche du bois que je travaille.{break}{mood:laugh}Voilà, maintenant, tu sais que j'ai une légère obsession pour le bois.{break}{mood:happy}Prenons un dernier verre et ensuite, j'irai me coucher.

Je savais bien que ça risquait d'arriver.{break}{mood:sad}Je ne vais pas te mentir, après tout ce que j'ai traversé, je me suis dit que tu étais peut-être la bonne personne pour moi.{break}J'espère qu'on restera en bons termes, mais il va me falloir du temps pour encaisser.
{mood:happy}C'est le week-end !

{mood:like}Je pense que d'une certaine manière, je l'ai toujours su.{break}Au plus profond de moi, je le sentais.{break}C'est une vérité fondamentale, comme le fait d'être en vie et ici avec toi.{break}{mood:happy}Je suis non binaire !{break}{mood:like}Le monde est peuplé de gens qui sont tous différents.{break}Nous sommes responsables de nous-mêmes, mais nous pouvons aimer d'autres personnes pour ce qu'elles sont.{break}{mood:happy}J'espère que tu vois ce que je veux dire.{break}Bon, et maintenant, prenons un dernier verre avant d'y aller !
{mood:sad}Oh, mi amor, mon cœur.{break}{mood:laugh}J'ai failli faire une crise cardiaque !{break}{mood:like}Heureusement que tu ne veux pas mettre un terme à notre relation.
C'est génial de voir que tu te plais ici.

{mood:awkward}Ah, c'est un peu trop personnel, comme question.{break}{mood:default}Je t'en parlerai peut-être un jour, mais pas maintenant.{break}{mood:sad}La blessure n'est pas encore complètement refermée.{break}Pardon, tu ne pouvais pas savoir.{break}{mood:like}Bon, allez, assez parlé de ça ! Tu veux qu'on prenne un dernier verre ?
{mood:sad}À force, je ne sais plus quoi fabriquer.

{mood:happy}Oh, quelle belle surprise ! Tu étais presque à l'heure, cette fois-ci !{break}{mood:laugh}Ne t'en fais pas, je te taquine.{break}{mood:like}Bon, passons aux choses sérieuses !{break}Ossono a deux nouvelles bières. La première est une brune de 12 % à base de mousserond.{break}La seconde est une ale de 6,5 % à base d'anguilles électriques.{break}{mood:happy}Je propose qu'on goûte les deux. Laquelle veux-tu ?
{mood:happy}Hola ! Est-ce que tu veux regarder le feu d'artifice avec moi ?
Tu veux savoir comment te faire apprécier de Gaïana ?{break}{mood:laugh}La patience et les plantes seront tes alliées.
L'ale !
Oui, avec plaisir !
{mood:sad}J'essaie de garder le sourire, mais aujourd'hui, ce n'est vraiment pas mon jour.
La brune !
Je ne sais pas encore...
Qu'est-ce qui a deux pouces et qui a déjà failli les scier ?{break}{mood:laugh}Moi !
Je veux juste un verre d'eau.
{mood:happy}Excellent ! J'espérais que tu me le proposes.{break}{mood:like}Viens, on va trouver un endroit sympa.
Tu veux acheter une chaise ?{break}{mood:like}Tu devrais. J'en ai plein en stock.

{mood:happy}Excellent choix ! Je prends la brune, alors.{break}{mood:like}On peut partager, si tu veux.{break}Je vois que tu aimes le risque, comme moi. C'est bien !{break}Parce qu'à mon avis, ces deux bières doivent être dégoûtantes.{break}{mood:happy}Mais si on ne les goûte pas, on ne saura jamais !{break}{mood:like}Et pour la petite histoire, je ne regrette pas d'avoir fait le choix effrayant de venir à un rendez-vous avec toi.{break}{mood:laugh}Enfin, ce n'est pas toi qui m'effraies, hein...{break}{mood:like}Ce qui me fait peur, c'est le risque que le rendez-vous tourne mal.{break}{mood:happy}Bon, ne bouge pas, je vais commander les bières !
Je vendrais un rein pour une tasse de café.

{mood:laugh}Tu as les mêmes goûts que moi ! Je vais aussi prendre la bière brune.{break}{mood:like}Honnêtement, j'espérais que tu prendrais l'ale pour qu'on puisse partager.{break}{mood:happy}Mais peut-être que ce n'est pas plus mal qu'on partage la même expérience ensemble.{break}{mood:like}Et merci d'avoir accepté de prendre ce risque avec moi.{break}Parce qu'à mon avis, ces deux bières doivent être infectes.{break}Mais j'aime vivre dangereusement ! La vie est plus intéressante comme ça.{break}{mood:happy}Bon, ne bouge pas, je vais commander les bières !
{mood:happy}C'est toujours un plaisir de te voir, surtout si tu HACHETTE quelque chose ! Héhéhé.

{mood:sad}Oh, dommage.{break}{mood:default}Tu n'es pas du genre aventureux ?{break}Je pensais qu'une personne comme toi cherchait toujours à découvrir de nouvelles choses.{break}{mood:happy}Ma devise, c'est « la chance sourit aux audacieux » !{break}{mood:happy}Je vais aller commander les deux bières pour moi, et un verre d'eau pour toi.{break}Ne bouge pas, je reviens avec tout ça !

{mood:happy}Ça alors !{break}{mood:like}Je n'avais jamais vu un esprit d'aussi près. Il est magnifique.{break}{mood:happy}Merci infiniment ! Je l'aime déjà !{break}{mood:like}Et pour te remercier, voici un plan. Prends-le, c'est gratuit !
{mood:awkward}Ne t'approche pas de moi !{break}{mood:laugh}Je viens de passer une heure à graisser une charnière.

{mood:sad}... et depuis ce jour, je ne supporte plus les mirapommes.{break}{mood:laugh}Je suppose que je n'aurais pas dû en manger autant.{break}{mood:like}Ah, c'est tellement agréable de parler avec toi.{break}{mood:laugh}Mais le temps passe trop vite ! Ça fait déjà trois heures qu'on est là.{break}Bon, assez parlé de moi.{break}{mood:like}J'ai remarqué que tu offrais souvent des cadeaux aux gens.{break}Et toi, quel est ton cadeau préféré ?

{mood:like}Ah, c'est l'esprit dont je t'ai parlé ?{break}{mood:default}Hmm... Ce n'est pas vraiment ce que j'avais imaginé...{break}{mood:happy}Mais ça ne me dérange pas d'attendre pour avoir l'esprit de mes rêves.
{mood:like}J'aime bien ta coupe de cheveux.{break}Tu crois que ça m'irait ?
J'aime les choses faites à la main.
{mood:like}Quand j'aurai fini, j'enfilerai mes chaussons et je m'endormirai dans mon fauteuil.
J'aime les graines et les plantes.
{mood:happy}Ah, tu as réussi ! Merci, alchimiste !{break}J'ai mis un peu d'argent de côté pour te remercier du temps que tu y as passé. Prends-le, j'insiste !
{mood:dislike}Il fait un froid de canard !
De l'argent.
Je crois que je vais aller rendre une petite visite à Ferra.{break}Il fait tellement chaud dans sa forge, à côté du feu.
